sentences.en: Figure 7 compares the primary SCRUM characteristics to those of other methodologies.
sentences.cn: 图7基本的SCRUM方法和其他方法特性的比较.

sentences.en: If the ball is passed forward the referee orders set scrum.
sentences.cn: 如果球被往前传了,裁判就会判并列争球.

sentences.en: Object Oriented technology provides the basis for the SCRUM methodology.
sentences.cn: 面向对象技术为SCRUM提供了技术基础.

sentences.en: Our observations have led us to conclude that SCRUM projects have both velocity and acceleration.
sentences.cn: 我们的观察发现SCRUM项目同时具有速度和加速度.

sentences.en: Procedural code, with its many and intertwined interfaces, is inappropriate for the SCRUM methodology.
sentences.cn: 面向过程的代码所具有的包含诸多相互交织的接口的特点对于SCRUM技术是不合适的.

sentences.en: SCRUM is a management, enhancement and maintenance methodology for an existing system.
sentences.cn: SCRUM是一种对已存在系统的管理, 提高和维护的方法.

sentences.en: SCRUM may be selectively applied to procedural systems with clean interfaces and strong data orientation.
sentences.cn: 然而对于有着清晰接口和明显的数据导向的面向过程的系统SCRUM技术还是可以考虑的.

sentences.en: SCRUM will address new or re - engineered systems development efforts at a later date.
sentences.cn: 在不久的将来,SCRUM将致力于新的或重组的系统开发.

sentences.en: She pushed through the scrum of photographers.
sentences.cn: 她从挤作一团的摄影记者中挤了过去。

sentences.en: Shoppers got into a scrum round the bargain counter.
sentences.cn: 顾客在廉价品柜台周围你争我夺.

sentences.en: The SCRUM approach is used at leading edge software companies with significant success.
sentences.cn: SCRUM方法现在被很多领先的软件公司成功使用.

sentences.en: The SCRUM methodology embodies these general, loose controls, using OO techniques for the actual construction deliverables.
sentences.cn: 在使用面向对象技术来构建实际的可发行软件过程中,SCRUM方法包括了一般化和松散的控制.

sentences.en: The SCRUM methodology, on the other hand , is designed to be quite flexible throughout.
sentences.cn: 然而, scrum方法论的设计自始至终具有很强的适应性.

sentences.en: There was a real scrum when the bus arrived.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车到站时，人们一窝蜂都往上挤。

sentences.en: These controls are used in the various phases of SCRUM.
sentences.cn: 这些控制因素存在于SCRUMf方法的不同阶段中.

words.tran_cn: 参与争球；排成争球队形
排成争球队形；参与争球（等于scrimmage）

trans.tran_cn: 并列争球，扭打，混乱，争夺
trans.tran_en: a part of a game of  rugby  when the players all push together in a circle, with their heads down, and try to get the ball
